Footer.label: The platform for decentralized data communication.

GetInvolved.title: Your Path to Impact Starts Here
GetInvolved.subtitle: Ixian is an open platform that welcomes everyone. Join the community, collaborate with innovators, and help shape the future of Internet.
GetInvolved.earnDesc: Support the Ixian network while earning $IXI rewards. Contribute to a decentralized, scalable blockchain and gain from the growth of the platform.
GetInvolved.joinCommunityDesc: Connect with the Ixian community. Every contribution counts towards the decentralized future we're building.

Metrics.title: Built for Scalability, Security and Real-world Use
Metrics.subtitle: Ixian is designed for real-world applications, providing the scalability and security needed to power a world of devices across industries—from end-user applications to IoT and smart cities. We’re reducing operational overhead and complexity in multi-user environments.
Metrics.note: *Data extrapolated from ixiscope and node metrics.

Ecosystem.title: Discover and Co-create a Vibrant Ecosystem
Ecosystem.subtitle: Ixian’s ecosystem unites cutting-edge technologies, tools, and a community to drive collaboration and growth. Built on a scalable blockchain with overlay DePIN, it supports a wide range of applications. Whether you’re a developer, entrepreneur, or innovator, Ixian provides the foundation to drive your vision forward.
Ecosystem.robustDesc: Ixian DLT forms the backbone of the platform and the ecosystem, supporting device discovery and high volume of low-cost microtransactions.
Ecosystem.overlayDesc: Ixian S2 ensures seamless data exchange across decentralized networks, driving real-time communication between connected devices.
Ecosystem.IxiCryptoDesc: Low-cost and high-throughput, $IXI is the native cryptocurrency that powers the entire ecosystem.
Ecosystem.devToolsDesc: Ixian provides a set of developer tools, including SDKs, APIs, and open-source libraries, offering developers the flexibility and scalability needed to build innovative solutions.
Ecosystem.communitySupportDesc: Share knowledge, collaborate on new projects, and receive support as you build the next generation of decentralized applications.
Ecosystem.spixiDesc: Spixi is a secure, user-friendly chat and wallet application which demonstrates the power of the Ixian platform.
Ecosystem.namesDesc: Attach your cryptographic addresses (IXI, BTC, SOL, ETH,...) and other data to a human-readable name. Secured by blockchain, it’s the first step in disrupting traditional name services.
Ecosystem.stayUp: Stay up to date with Ixian as we roll out new and exciting features.

UseCases.title: Solving Tomorrows Challenges Today
UseCases.subtitle: We collaborate with industry partners to drive innovation, streamline integration, and empower businesses to deploy next-gen solutions on the Ixian platform.

card1.title: Secure IoT
card1.subtitle: Securely connect smart devices, sensors, drones, and vehicles without centralized control and without single points of failure.

card2.title: Smart Access Control
card2.subtitle: Revolutionize hotel check-ins or secure home access with device-based controls.

card3.title: Low-cost Infrastructure
card3.subtitle: Enable private, encrypted network and facilitate secure communication for your organization.

Partners.buildTogether: Shift the Paradigm, Decentralize With Ixian
Partners.buildSubtitle: Ixian is ready for your next step, are you?

LandingHero.chip: The Open-Source Decentralized Data Streaming Platform
LandingHero.title: The Building Blocks of a Connected World
LandingHero.subtitle: Bringing together a world of devices with secure, seamless, and reliable connections. Allowing you to cut costs, enhance security, and confidently deploy products and services at scale.

security.title: Make Your Data Communications Secure
security.subtitle: Whether it’s connecting IoT devices, running smart cities and factories, or transmitting voice and video, Ixian eliminates the need for a trusted third party, helping users maintain full security and control.

card1.title: Secure & Trustless Authorization
card1.subtitle: The Ixian platform uses Public Key Infrastructure as an identifier which enables client authentication, secure and trustless device discovery, serving as a foundation for the security of the platform.

card2.title: Trustless Device Discovery
card2.subtitle: Instantly discover and connect a world of devices across the internet. Ixian’s self-sovereign client discovery enables smooth integration and communication between all connected devices.

card3.title: Secure Communication
card3.subtitle: Ensure your data is transmitted securely between devices across the internet without relying on third-party intermediaries. Ixian is bringing a paradigm shift in online device communication.

efficiency.title: Harness Efficiency and Scalability With Ixian
efficiency.subtitle: Unlock the power of scalable, high-performance applications with minimal resource usage. Enjoy lower deployment and operational costs, effortlessly handling large volumes of data and on-chain transactions, all while scaling your business more efficiently and affordably.

card1.title: Scalable Platform
card1.subtitle: The Ixian Platform is designed for limitless scalability, with no theoretical limit to how many devices can interact with the network. It’s designed to support a connected world of devices, now and into the future.

card2.title: High-transaction Throughput
card2.subtitle: With no theoretical limit to how many transactions the network can process (by design), Ixian will super-charge your high-demand application or service.

card3.title: Low Resource Usage
card3.subtitle: Transactions, data processing and communication between devices occur with minimal resource consumption, reducing your operational costs.

build.title: Minimize Infrastructure Costs and Move Faster
build.subtitle: Ixian provides the tools and resources you need to easily integrate our tech into your applications.

card1.title: Decentralized Data Streaming
card1.subtitle: Broadcast and exchange data securely across Ixian’s distributed network, eliminating the need for trusted third parties while maintaining robust security.

card2.title: Monetize With $IXI Cryptocurrency
card2.subtitle: Utilize $IXI monetization within your apps and services. Ixian’s native cryptocurrency is fast, robust and scalable.

card3.title: Cross-platform Support
card3.subtitle: Ixian is designed to support multiple platforms and devices, making it easy to integrate with existing infrastructure and scale across businesses.

openSourceCard.title: Open-source Since 2018
openSourceCard.subtitle: Decentralization starts with openness. Our commitment to open-source means continuous innovation, community-driven development, and trustless technology.

article1.title: Learn How a Chat App Significantly Reduced Operational Costs
article1.subtitle: A private chat app and wallet, built on the Ixian decentralized network, operates with near-zero costs while ensuring security and privacy.

hero.title: Two Layers, One Powerful Platform
hero.subtitle: Ixian operates through two key decentralized networks Ixian DLT and Ixian S2, which together form the foundation for a wide range of secure, global network applications.

startBuilding.title: Start Building Now
startBuilding.subtitle: Start reducing costs while improving the security and reliability of your project.

gitSection.title: Proudly Open-Source
gitSection.subtitle: We are committed to building Ixian in public. It's open source and available for anyone to contribute to or audit on GitHub.

ixianDlt.title: High-Performance Layer-1 Blockchain
ixianDlt.subtitle: Designed for efficiency and scalability, Ixian DLT forms the backbone of the Ixian Platform. The DLT network leverages proof-of-collaborative-work to handle large volumes of transactions efficiently.

data1.title: IXI Names Registry
data1.subtitle: Allows users to register human-readable names and attach their cryptographic or other addresses (IXI, BTC, SOL, ETH, Email, URL...).

data2.title: Transaction Processing
data2.subtitle: Ixian DLT allows users to transfer $IXI cryptocurrency between each other, and maintains an immutable history of all transactions.

data3.title: No Theoretical Scaling Limit
data3.subtitle: Ixian is built to scale horizontally. This means that there is no theoretical limit to how many devices can connect to the platform and how many transactions the network can process.

card1.title: $IXI Cryptocurrency
card1.subtitle: Native cryptocurrency of the Ixian Platform. Designed for minimal transaction fees and efficiency.

card2.title: Proof-of-Collaborative-Work
card2.subtitle: A novel approach that combines the benefits of Proof-of-Work with more efficient collaboration between nodes. Ixian is built to minimize the risk of forking.

card3.title: Simplicity
card3.subtitle: Ixian DLT is a no-fuss blockchain. By avoiding additional complexity and overhead, it offers an efficient and performance oriented solution.

ixianS2.title: Distributed Overlay DePIN
ixianS2.subtitle: Ixian S2 is an overlay Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Network which augments the Ixian DLT by relaying transactions, SPV proofs and presences between users and the blockchain. Its primary function however is to relay data between any two end-points or users, facilitating the device-to-device and user-to-user communication. S2 network’s capability increases as more nodes join, supporting the growing demands of decentralized applications and Internet-of-Things ecosystems.

card1.title: Trustless Device Discovery
card1.subtitle: Instantly discover and connect billions of devices across the network. Ixian’s trustless device discovery enables smooth integration and communication between connected devices.

card2.title: Trustless Communication
card2.subtitle: Unlock secure communication and trustless device discovery with decentralized control of your data. This feature ensures privacy and authenticity, allowing for secure interactions across the network.

card3.title: Secure Data Transfer
card3.subtitle: Stream data securely between devices across the internet, eliminating the need for trusted third party while maintaining robust security.

ixiCurrency.title: Ixian’s Native Cryptocurrency
ixiCurrency.subtitle: By creating an incentive for node operators, $IXI powers the platform. With its fixed supply, fast and efficient transactions, it creates the foundation for an ecosystem of value.

card1.title: Low-Cost & Fast Transactions
card1.subtitle: With minimal fees, $IXI is ensuring the ecosystem runs smoothly without the burden of high costs. Transactions are designed to be fast, efficient, and to scale effortlessly. This allows indie developers, businesses as well as users to benefit from affordability, reliability and speed.

card2.title: Fair Distribution
card2.subtitle: $IXI is generated through block rewards for DLT node operators, ensuring a decentralized and equitable distribution. There were no pre-sales or private sales, making the process fully transparent and accessible to all participants. 9% of the total projected supply is allocated as a pre-mine for platform and ecosystem development.

metrics.note: *Data extrapolated from ixiscope and node metrics.

ixiCurrency.exchangesSubtitle: Get more information about $IXI and trading pairs.

hero.title: Build Smarter, Spend Less
hero.subtitle: Significantly reduce your operational costs and boost security by utilizing Ixian in your products and services.
hero.readyToBuildSubtitle: Start reducing costs while improving the security and reliability of your project.

data1.title: The Ixian Advantage
data1.subtitle: When you require trustless and secure client discovery, end-to-end communication and human readable name registration.

data2.title: Uncompromised Security
data2.subtitle: Built on the principle of trustless authentication and self-sovereignty, Ixian boosts your project’s security.

data3.title: Easy Integration
data3.subtitle: Get up and running with Ixian’s core DLT and Overlay networks in a few simple steps.

data4.title: High Scalability
data4.subtitle: Don’t limit your aspirations and build on the highly scalable Ixian platform.

data5.title: 100% Network Uptime
data5.subtitle: Decentralized architecture ensures that your products and services are always available.

data6.title: Minimal Infrastructure Costs
data6.subtitle: Significantly reduce your operational costs by off-loading parts or entire project’s infrastructure to Ixian’s decentralized platform.

card1.title: Ixian Protocol Documentation
card1.subtitle: Learn about Ixian protocol to kick start your next project.

card2.title: API Documentation
card2.subtitle: Learn how to interact with the Ixian DLT and S2 nodes through API end-points.

card3.title: Node Setup Guide
card3.subtitle: Everything you need to get your nodes up and running.

card4.title: GitHub Repository
card4.subtitle: Ixian is open source. Visit our GitHub repo.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: We have some common questions answered to get you started.
faq.q1: How do I start developing with Ixian?
faq.a1: You should get going pretty fast with everything setup easily for you to read and work on. If  you have any additional questions, might want to check the community.
faq.q2: What can I build on Ixian?
faq.q3: How do I participate in the Ixian network?

hero.title: About Ixian
hero.subtitle: Our mission is to create a world where devices can communicate efficiently and securely, without the need for central intermediaries. We aim to provide a scalable, decentralized infrastructure that powers the future of IoT, smart cities, and beyond.

founders.title: Driven by Innovation, United by a Shared Vision
founders.subtitle: Ixian’s founders are passionate innovators and engineers with extensive knowledge and expertise in blockchain, decentralized technology, cryptography and secure communications. Committed to shaping the more secure and interconnected world.

partnerships.title: Advancing Decentralized Infrastructure Together
partnerships.subtitle: Ixian is building the infrastructure that will connect the next wave of IoT and other online devices. We want you to be a part of it. Whether you’re a developer, business, or partner, there are endless opportunities to get involved.

hero.title: Discover the Ecosystem
hero.subtitle: Ixian’s ecosystem is dynamic and evolving fast.

community.title: Community First
community.subtitle: Ixian thrives on the collective efforts of a passionate community. Whether you're a developer, designer, translator, or simply an enthusiast, there's a place for you to make an impact. Join us and help shape the future of decentralized technology, one contribution at a time.

spixiCard.title: Spixi Private Chat and Wallet
spixiCard.subtitle: The best way to interact with the Ixian ecosystem, and the best wallet to hold your $IXI. Take control of your communications with decentralized messenger.

poweringIxian.title: $IXI Cryptocurrency
poweringIxian.subtitle: By creating an incentive for node operators, $IXI powers the platform. With fast and efficient transactions, it creates the foundation for an ecosystem of value.

wallets.title: Wallets
wallets.subtitle: Did you know you can mine $IXI? Ixian uses Argon mining for fair distribution. Download the miner, setup and start.

contribute.title: Help Shape the Future of Ixian
contribute.subtitle: Contribute to Ixian’s growth by helping with development, writing documentation, and promoting the platform.
